title: Laucnher and/or Client are not opening
body:
My client was bugging out recently and then I was having trouble jus logging in, I choose to uninstall league and reinstall it; however, now it won't even launch. The logo pops up then it freezes right there after I attempt to launch the game. 

The steps I've taken so far are:
-Being patient with the client and waiting for riot to fix it, that didn't get me anywhere(story of my life)
-Uninstalling then reinstalling.....made things worst
-Factory resetting my computer (goodbye all my files)..... still same problem I had after reinstalling....

WHAT DO I DO? RITO tell me! {{champion:2}}
plz upvote so it gets solved

replies.body: So you see the League logo pop up but the client itself never opens no matter how long you wait? That sounds like it's probably a simple issue of not having the right permissions setup. Follow the steps in the [**permissions guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to make sure League is able to access the files it needs to run and you should be good to go!
